header.line: [08 Jul 2008] DSA-1604-1 bind - DNS cache poisoning
header.name: DSA-1604-1

annotations.line: NOTE: <unfixed> (backport too complicated, solution: upgrade to bind9 or have bind8 forward queries to a bind9 resolver)
annotations.description: <unfixed> (backport too complicated, solution: upgrade to bind9 or have bind8 forward queries to a bind9 resolver)

annotations.line: NOTE: DSA issued as an avisory about actions user can take to protect against this vulnerability
annotations.description: DSA issued as an avisory about actions user can take to protect against this vulnerability
